data.text:
Father, wait here! 
I'll be there like 'whoooosh' really soon! Ready…
data.name: Young Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Father, wait here! 
󠁿I'll be there like 'whoooosh' really soon! Ready…

data.text: (Running…I loved it, I think. Probably, long ago.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿(Running…I loved it, I think. Probably, long ago.)

data.text:
(But, I understood. My normal course was a small 
garden surrounded by tall, rock walls. The goal 
was always the clover field in the corner.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿(But, I understood. My normal course was a small 
󠁿garden surrounded by tall, rock walls. The goal 
󠁿was always the clover field in the corner.)

data.text: (I was fine with that. I wasn't dissatisfied.)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿(I was fine with that. I wasn't dissatisfied.)

data.text:
The clash of dreams, a momentary glimmer, a serious race…! 
Awesome! So cool!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿The clash of dreams, a momentary glimmer, a serious race…! 
󠁿Awesome! So cool!

data.text:
"Japan Uma Musume Training Center Academy"! 
I want to go there too…!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿"Japan Uma Musume Training Center Academy"! 
󠁿I want to go there too…!

data.text: (Dissatisfied…)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿(Dissatisfied…)

data.text:
Wa, you're! Um, what's wrong? 
…you've got a scary look on your face.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Wa, you're! Um, what's wrong? 
󠁿…you've got a scary look on your face.

data.text:
Since then, I've been thinking. About the burden of her duty, 
about my resolve to bear some of that burden. But still-

choices.text: I really want to hear your thoughts
I really want to hear your thoughts

data.processed:
󠁿Since then, I've been thinking. About the burden of her duty, 
󠁿about my resolve to bear some of that burden. But still-

data.text:
My thoughts? About…what we spoke about a while ago, about 
"Being satisfied with just this"?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿My thoughts? About…what we spoke about a while ago, about 
󠁿"Being satisfied with just this"?

data.text: Hmmm, my answer… won't change, I suppose.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Hmmm, my answer… won't change, I suppose.

data.text:
I'm very happy you're concerned about me! But, you 
see, in the first place- compared to the other girls 
at this school, I'm a different Uma Musume.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿I'm very happy you're concerned about me! But, you 
󠁿see, in the first place- compared to the other girls 
󠁿at this school, I'm a different Uma Musume.

data.text:
For the family and people I must protect, to devote 
myself to their long term peace and prosperity. That 
is my duty. My pride. The reason I'm here.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿For the family and people I must protect, to devote 
󠁿myself to their long term peace and prosperity. That 
󠁿is my duty. My pride. The reason I'm here.

data.text: You see? I wasn't born for the sake of running.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿You see? I wasn't born for the sake of running.

data.text:
Every single word she spoke of while smiling, 
was extremely heavy. …But, even so.

choices.text: Not your "Reason", I want to hear your "Feelings"
choices.processed: <size=33>Not your "Reason", I want to hear your "Feelings"</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Every single word she spoke of while smiling, 
󠁿was extremely heavy. …But, even so.

data.text:
Royalty. Her duty. Her responsibility. 
The reason she spoke of, it's all correct. But, even so-!

choices.text: Those aren't reasons to give up your dream
choices.processed: <size=38>Those aren't reasons to give up your dream</size>

choices.text: Those aren't reasons to give up your dream
choices.processed: <size=38>Those aren't reasons to give up your dream</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Royalty. Her duty. Her responsibility. 
󠁿The reason she spoke of, it's all correct. But, even so-!

data.text: Dreams…
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Dreams…

data.text:
Dreams…mine…? 
…
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Dreams…mine…? 
󠁿…

data.text:
Fine Motion suddenly fell silent. 
She probably needs a trigger for the sake of facing her feelings.
data.processed:
󠁿Fine Motion suddenly fell silent. 
󠁿She probably needs a trigger for the sake of facing her feelings.

data.text: That's why-
data.processed: 󠁿That's why-

data.text: The hell d'you say?…a mock race against Fine?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿The hell d'you say?…a mock race against Fine?

data.text:
Is your memory 0 bytes? Don't make me say it again, bastard. 
Didn't I tell you not to half-heartedly stick your nose in!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
󠁿Is your memory 0 bytes? Don't make me say it again, bastard. 
󠁿Didn't I tell you not to half-heartedly stick your nose in!

data.text: …Aaah?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿…Aaah?

data.text: You shouldn't speak so lightly, Trainer-sama.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed: 󠁿You shouldn't speak so lightly, Trainer-sama.

data.text: Heh, they've got their eyes on you.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿Heh, they've got their eyes on you.

data.text:
Excuse me, but you don't seem to understand the 
seriousness of the situation. This will expose 
a noble person to unnecessary danger.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
󠁿Excuse me, but you don't seem to understand the 
󠁿seriousness of the situation. This will expose 
󠁿a noble person to unnecessary danger.

data.text: -Even you yourself, may lose everything.
data.name: SP Commander

choices.text: Like I said, I am resolved.

data.processed: 󠁿-Even you yourself, may lose everything.

data.text:
…No, you clearly do not understand! 
As someone who's duty is to protect Her Highness, I must firmly-
data.name: SP Commander

choices.text: Supporting their dreams with everything I have is my job!
choices.processed: <size=29>Supporting their dreams with everything I have is my job!</size>

choices.text: Supporting their dreams with everything I have is my job!
choices.processed: <size=29>Supporting their dreams with everything I have is my job!</size>

data.processed:
󠁿…No, you clearly do not understand! 
󠁿As someone who's duty is to protect Her Highness, I must firmly-

data.text: Tch… whatever, this is annoying.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿Tch… whatever, this is annoying.

data.text: And? When are we doing this mock race?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿And? When are we doing this mock race?

data.text:
Commander…will you really overlook this? 
It's a mock race, after all.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Commander…will you really overlook this? 
󠁿It's a mock race, after all.

data.text:
Trainer-sama is here to fully support Your Highness, 
even risking her entire existence. On top of that, 
if Your Highness also wishes it-
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-sama is here to fully support Your Highness, 
󠁿even risking her entire existence. On top of that, 
󠁿if Your Highness also wishes it-

data.text:
…As someone who's been by your side watching over your labors, 
I can do no more to stop you… do as your heart desires.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
󠁿…As someone who's been by your side watching over your labors, 
󠁿I can do no more to stop you… do as your heart desires.

data.text: I want to-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿I want to-

data.text: Hey! How long do you plan on standing over there?!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿Hey! How long do you plan on standing over there?!

data.text:
Or what? Since you've come this far, you're not going to say 
something stupid like "Even without running I'm satisfied" right?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
󠁿Or what? Since you've come this far, you're not going to say 
󠁿something stupid like "Even without running I'm satisfied" right?

data.text: …Shakur.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿…Shakur.

data.text:
Don't act like you understand just by watching from 
"Over There", Your Royal Highness. "Over Here" this 
passion, this intensity, isn't so simple.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
󠁿Don't act like you understand just by watching from 
󠁿"Over There", Your Royal Highness. "Over Here" this 
󠁿passion, this intensity, isn't so simple.

data.text: Let's go, Fine. -I won't let you say you don't want to know.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿Let's go, Fine. -I won't let you say you don't want to know.

data.text: And so - the mock race between these two, finally, began!
data.processed: 󠁿And so - the mock race between these two, finally, began!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa…!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa, haa…!

data.text:
(Incredible, with each step my entire leg trembles. 
The scenery goes rushing by. My heart is unbearably 
loud…I… right now, I'm running!!)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿(Incredible, with each step my entire leg trembles. 
󠁿The scenery goes rushing by. My heart is unbearably 
󠁿loud…I… right now, I'm running!!)

data.text: Ha! Oi oi! Is that all you got, Your Royal Highness?!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿Ha! Oi oi! Is that all you got, Your Royal Highness?!

data.text:
(Shakur…! What pressure-…I'm getting goosebumps! Just like 
this, it seems I'll be overwhelmed!! But…But, why is it?!)
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿(Shakur…! What pressure-…I'm getting goosebumps! Just like 
󠁿this, it seems I'll be overwhelmed!! But…But, why is it?!)

data.text:
It seems even now…still, I can run!! 
-HAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿It seems even now…still, I can run!! 
󠁿-HAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!

data.text:
! Heh, looks like you can handle it…! 
But, I won't let you! ORAAAAAAAAAAA!!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
󠁿! Heh, looks like you can handle it…! 
󠁿But, I won't let you! ORAAAAAAAAAAA!!

data.text: AAAAAAAAAH…!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿AAAAAAAAAH…!!

data.text:
(Aah… amazing. My heart is pounding. My soul is crying out! 
"Faster" "Keep Moving Forward" "Run", "RUN!")
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿(Aah… amazing. My heart is pounding. My soul is crying out! 
󠁿"Faster" "Keep Moving Forward" "Run", "RUN!")

data.text: I am-…I'm also…!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿I am-…I'm also…!

data.text: Haaa…haaa…haaa…
data.name: Both
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa…haaa…haaa…

data.text: -Heh. It's my win.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: 󠁿-Heh. It's my win.

data.text: Fufuu…yeah. It's extremely frustrating!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Fufuu…yeah. It's extremely frustrating!

data.text:
Trainer!…Thank you. 
Thank you, for giving me the chance to face my own feelings.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer!…Thank you. 
󠁿Thank you, for giving me the chance to face my own feelings.

data.text: Also, I'm sorry. I told a lie.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Also, I'm sorry. I told a lie.

data.text: I… don't want to return home just yet.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿I… don't want to return home just yet.

data.text:
Because I want to stay here. 
And run. More and more…!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Because I want to stay here. 
󠁿And run. More and more…!

data.text:
Boldly declaring that, her eyes shone brightly. 
Brighter than any time before this.
data.processed:
󠁿Boldly declaring that, her eyes shone brightly. 
󠁿Brighter than any time before this.
